components.name: com.meta.spatial.toolkit.Animated

attributes.name: startTime
attributes.description: World time at which animation started (ms since epoch)

attributes.name: pausedTime
attributes.description: Paused location/time (sec) within animation track

attributes.name: playbackState
attributes.description: State of the animation (playing or paused)

attributes.name: playbackType
attributes.description: The type of animation playback to be used

attributes.name: track
attributes.description: which animation track of the glTF to play

components.name: com.meta.spatial.toolkit.Audio

attributes.name: audio
attributes.description: The Uri String of the audio file to be used

components.name: com.meta.spatial.toolkit.AvatarAttachment

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
Which part of the avatar the entity is meant to represent (i.e. “head”, “body”, “right_hand”,
 “left_controller”)

components.description: Defines what part of an Avatar the entity is meant to represent. (head, body, controller, etc.)

components.name: com.meta.spatial.toolkit.AvatarBody
com.meta.spatial.toolkit.Box

attributes.name: min
attributes.description:
The relative offset of the bottom corner (furthest in the -x, -y, -z direction) of the box from
 the center

attributes.name: max
attributes.description:
The relative offset of the top corner (furthest in the +x, +y, +z direction) of the box from
 the center

components.name: com.meta.spatial.toolkit.Controller

attributes.name: buttonState
attributes.description: The current state of the buttons being pressed represented by integer bits

attributes.name: changedButtons
attributes.description:
Which buttons (represented by integer bits) have been changed (pressed or unpressed since the
 last frame)

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: What type of controller it is: 0->controller 1->hand 2->eye

attributes.name: directTouchButtonState
attributes.description: The state of the direct touch buttons

attributes.name: state
attributes.description:
Different states of CreatorVisibility, such as only visible to the creator, or only invisible
 to the creator

components.name: com.meta.spatial.toolkit.Dome

attributes.name: radius
attributes.description: The radius of the dome in meters

components.name: com.meta.spatial.toolkit.Grabbable

attributes.name: enabled
attributes.description: Defines whether the object can be grabbed or not.

attributes.name: isGrabbed
attributes.description: Whether the object is currently grabbed or not

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of behavior an object has when grabbed (faces user, pivots on y axis, etc.)

attributes.name: minHeight
attributes.description: the minimum height an object can be held when grabbed

attributes.name: maxHeight
attributes.description: the maximum height an object can be held when grabbed

components.name: com.meta.spatial.toolkit.Hittable

attributes.name: hittable
attributes.description: The type of behavior the object can be hit using

components.name: com.meta.spatial.toolkit.Panel
com.meta.spatial.toolkit.PanelClickState
com.meta.spatial.toolkit.PanelDimensions
com.meta.spatial.toolkit.Plane
com.meta.spatial.toolkit.Quad
com.meta.spatial.toolkit.RoundedBox

attributes.name: min
attributes.description:
The relative offset of the bottom corner (furthest in the -x, -y, -z direction) of the box from
 the center

attributes.name: max
attributes.description:
The relative offset of the top corner (furthest in the +x, +y, +z direction) of the box from
 the center

attributes.name: radius
attributes.description:
The radii of the rounded edges of the box, where the radii corresponds to the edges along that
 plane. (i.e radius.x corresponds to the edges running along in the x axis)

components.description:
Defines the dimensions of a box shape with rounded edges by the relative offset of two opposite
 corners and a Vector3 of radii to modify the roundedness of the edges

components.name: com.meta.spatial.toolkit.ScenePlane
com.meta.spatial.toolkit.SceneVolume
com.meta.spatial.toolkit.Sphere

attributes.name: radius
attributes.description: The radius of the sphere in meters

components.name: com.meta.spatial.toolkit.SupportsLocomotion
components.description:
This component is used to indicate that an entity supports locomotion. When added to an entity
 with a mesh, it allows for default locomotion on the mesh

components.name: com.meta.spatial.toolkit.Visible

attributes.name: isVisible
attributes.description: The mesh’s current visibility state.

components.description:
Gives the ability to change mesh between being visible and invisible.

 @param isVisible The mesh’s current visibility state.
